title: Prime Minister of Spain - Wikipedia
snippet: In the Civil War, the head of government among the Nationalists was called Chief of the Government of the State and since January 1938 the office acquired the current name, President of the Government, but between that date and 1973 the office was held by Francisco Franco as dictator of Spain.

title: La Moncloa. Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón [Biography]
snippet: Pedro Sánchez has been President of the Government of Spain since June 2018. He holds a Doctorate in Economics and is General Secretary of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (Spanish acronym: PSOE), which he joined in 1993.

title: Pedro Sánchez - Wikipedia
snippet: Sánchez was formally installed as Prime Minister of Spain by King Felipe VI on 2 June 2018.
